basics.summary: I am a software engineer who is constantly tinkering, reading, and building. I love taking on new projects and further existing ones. Check out my site for more on what I am up to. I built the site in reacting with an I always looked. Apart from my work, I have multiple personal and technical background, which I have gained experience and applying those processes.

references.reference: I worked with Arnar for more than 5 years and is a great enthusiastic & approachable leader. His mastery on API design and documentation, has been critical in launching many successfully appears in many designs.
